# identifier

**Type Property**

The axis identifier value as a number object.

## Declaration

```swift
static let identifier: NSFontDescriptor.VariationKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object.

## Variation Keys

- **minimumValue**: The minimum axis value as a number object.
- **maximumValue**: The maximum axis value as a number object.
- **defaultValue**: The default axis value as a number object.
- **name**: The localized variation axis name.
